org.restlet
Interface RestletCall

All Superinterfaces:
UniformCall
All Known Implementing Classes:
RestletCallWrapper
public interface RestletCall
extends UniformCall

Represents a call to be handled by restlets. In addition to a uniform call, a restlet call contains the parsing stack of the resource's URI done by parent restlets or maplets.

Method Summary
 List<String> getMatches()
          Returns the list of substring matched in the current restlet's path.
 String getPath(int index, boolean strip)
          Returns one of the paths in the list.
 List<String> getPaths()
          Returns the list of paths dividing the initial resource path.
 
Methods inherited from interface org.restlet.UniformCall
getCharacterSetPrefs, getClientAddress, getClientName, getCookies, getCookieSettings, getInput, getLanguagePrefs, getMediaTypePrefs, getMethod, getOutput, getReferrerRef, getResourceRef, getStatus, setBestOutput, setCharacterSetPrefs, setClientAddress, setClientName, setCookies, setInput, setLanguagePrefs, setMediaTypePrefs, setMethod, setOutput, setReferrerRef, setResourceRef, setStatus, setTemporaryRedirect
 

Method Detail

getPaths

List<String> getPaths()
Returns the list of paths dividing the initial resource path. The list is sorted according to the restlets hierarchy.

Returns:
The list of restlets paths.

getPath

String getPath(int index,
               boolean strip)
Returns one of the paths in the list. The first path is the resource path relatively to the current restlet. The second path is the current reslet path relatively to the parent restlet. All the hierarchy of restlet paths is also available depending on the restlet tree.

Parameters:
index - Index of the path in the list.
strip - Indicates if leading and ending slashes should be stripped.
Returns:
The path at the given index.

getMatches

List<String> getMatches()
Returns the list of substring matched in the current restlet's path.

Returns:
The list of substring matched.
See Also:
Matcher.group()
